Author: ECKOcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO][ECKO] ECKO Coin | x13 | POS | Masternodes
Body: Major Announcement: We are adding Masternodes. We have also changed the ICO prices in rounds 3 to 6. The eckocoin website is being re designed completely and due to this the ICO for round 2 has been extended by a week. The new start dates (if the coins are not sold out) are updated in the OP. We will soon be updating the whitepaper with more details about masternodes.  We have a requirement. We need a bounty manager to manage ECKO Coin bounties at Bitcointalk. Please contact us if you are an experienced bounty manager with either a hero or legendary ranking.  Edit: My previous post on the older ICO plan has been deleted.

Author: ECKOcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO][ECKO] ECKO Coin | x13 | POS | Masternodes
Body: ECKO Coin | Real World Community  WEBSITE  WHITE PAPER  Source code, desktop wallets and explorer will be available at the end of ICO.  5000 ECKO Bounty for translations. Machine translations will be rejected. Members reserving for translations should be able to create a thread in the respective language boards. Additional bounties will be given for regular updates.      Introducing  ECKO Coin, a decentralized crypto currency initiated by Real World Community (RWC). RWC, a team of networkers have been connected for more than a year. Members of the team have several years of combined experience and are experts in design, development, marketing, cryptocurrency etc. The team has come together to make a difference. Provide an opportunity, for people around the world, to earn from the ECKO platform & coin. The roadmap gives an idea of what to expect from ECKO. ECKO Coin designed by keeping in mind, the community and providing an opportunity scarcely heard of in the crypto currency industry.  VisionCPE20, Community Paradise 2020 providing virtual experience earning real time. 3 Core Products with high levels of security with ECKO as the payment mode. Scam free experience, responsive support and amazing earning opportunities packaged in each of the products. The fees from the products will be distributed to the co-owners and round 1 participants in the ICO, proportionately and will also be used for future developments and updates.  The 3 core products are Marketplace portal where members will be able to find small jobs or tasks and get paid in ECKO. It is also a place where members can find professionals in different industries based on their requirement. Peer to Peer Exchange The peer to peer exchange in the ECKO platform will solve this issue by providing an opportunity for members to buy and sell ECKO and few other crypto currencies with FIAT. 3D Virtual Gaming World The virtual world consists of 3D environments, objects and characters. Members will be able to create their own objects and avatars in the virtual world. The unique aspect of the virtual simulation gaming in the ECKO platform is the integration of the marketplace and the peer to peer exchange in the gaming world. Members will be able to stay in the virtual world and transact or communicate real time in the marketplace as well as the peer to peer exchange.         Coin Name     -    ECKO Coin Ticker -    ECKO Algorithm -    X13 Total Coin Supply   -    400 Million Coin Type -    POS POS Block time -    60 Seconds Coin Age -    24 Hours POS Rate -    10% Per Annum  Collateral -     100000 ECKO Confirmations -     15 Reward -     Variable    Coins are distributed through pre-ICO, ICO and bounties. The pre-ICO is the opportunity to become a co-owner of the coin and is limited to a maximum of 150 positions/shares. Each position/share costs 0.005 BTC and gives 100,000 ECKO Coins. The co-owner positions have been sold out. Coins will be distributed after the end of the 6th round of ICO or latest by 29th of March 2018. Social Media Bounties have been announced in the Facebook group and is already live. We are looking for a good bounty manager to start the Bitcointalk bounties.  Total Coins -     300 Million Reserved for Dev -     80 Million Pre-ICO -     15 Million ICO -     200 Million Bounties -     5 Million    ICO started on February 1, 2018 at 5 PM UK time. The ICO has 6 rounds and each round runs till the scheduled date of next round or until the round is sold out whichever is earlier. If a round is sold out within the scheduled days, the next round starts immediately. 25% of the unsold coins in a round are burned at the end of the ICO. ICO purchases are through the ECKO Coin Website                                        ECKO will be listed in at least 2 exchanges after the completion of the ICO rounds.
